socorro_links.comment_text:
32 crashes from 17 installs of the latest Nightly 145.0a1 20250926204708. This could be a regression from bug 1968890, code sheriffs will revert it. If the crash volume persists, it will be relanded.

Crash report: https://crash-stats.mozilla.org/report/index/a1545ddb-8b76-46d5-abf6-ad2b30250927

Reason:
```
EXCEPTION_ACCESS_VIOLATION_READ
```

Top 10 frames:
```
0  xul.dll  js::gc::HeaderWord::get() const  js/src/gc/Cell.h:108
0  xul.dll  js::gc::CellWithTenuredGCPointer<js::gc::Cell, js::Shape>::headerPtr() const  js/src/gc/Cell.h:800
0  xul.dll  JSObject::shape() const  js/src/vm/JSObject.h:94
0  xul.dll  JSObject::getClass() const  js/src/vm/JSObject.h:115
0  xul.dll  JSObject::is() const  js/src/vm/JSObject.h:505
0  xul.dll  JS::FinishLoadingImportedModuleFailed(JSContext*, JS::Handle<JS::Value>, JS::...  js/src/vm/Modules.cpp:166
1  xul.dll  JS::loader::ModuleLoaderBase::OnLoadRequestedModulesRejected(JSContext*, JS::...  js/loader/ModuleLoaderBase.cpp:1351
2  xul.dll  JS::loader::ModuleLoaderBase::OnLoadRequestedModulesRejected(JSContext*, JS::...  js/loader/ModuleLoaderBase.cpp:1332
2  xul.dll  JS::loader::ModuleLoaderBase::OnLoadRequestedModulesRejected(JSContext*, unsi...  js/loader/ModuleLoaderBase.cpp:1324
3  xul.dll  CallJSNative(JSContext*, bool (*)(JSContext*, unsigned int, JS::Value*), js::...  js/src/vm/Interpreter.cpp:490
```
